00023 /* FIFO queue */
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include <stdlib.h>
00027 #include <string.h>
00028 
00029 #include "internal_comm_rx_queue.h"
00030 
00032 int_comm_rx_queue_struct int_comm_rx_queue;
00033 
00035 void int_comm_rx_queue_init(void) {
00036         int_comm_rx_queue.first = 0;
00037         int_comm_rx_queue.last = 0;
00038 }
00039 
00043 void int_comm_rx_queue_add(UC_MESSAGE message) {
00044         int_comm_rx_queue.message[int_comm_rx_queue.last++] = message;
00045         
00046         if (int_comm_rx_queue.last >= INTERNAL_COMM_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00047                 int_comm_rx_queue.last = 0;
00048         
00049         if (int_comm_rx_queue.last == int_comm_rx_queue.first)
00050                 int_comm_rx_queue.first++;
00051         
00052         if (int_comm_rx_queue.first >= INTERNAL_COMM_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00053                 int_comm_rx_queue.first = 0;    
00054 }
00055 
00059 UC_MESSAGE int_comm_rx_queue_get(void) {
00060         //Return the message (content of the first node)
00061         return(int_comm_rx_queue.message[int_comm_rx_queue.first]);
00062 }
00063 
00066 void int_comm_rx_queue_drop(void) {
00067         int_comm_rx_queue.first++;
00068         
00069         if (int_comm_rx_queue.first >= INTERNAL_COMM_RX_QUEUE_SIZE)
00070                 int_comm_rx_queue.first = 0;
00071 }
00072 
00076 void int_comm_rx_queue_dropall(void) {
00077         int_comm_rx_queue.first = 0;
00078         int_comm_rx_queue.last = 0;
00079 }
00080 
00084 unsigned char int_comm_rx_queue_is_empty(void) {
00085         if (int_comm_rx_queue.first == int_comm_rx_queue.last)
00086                 return(1);
00087         else
00088                 return(0);
00089 }
